summary: MY FORD TAURUS 1999 SE-MODEL, VIN# [XXX], HAS 69,095 AND THE FRONT WHEEL BEARINGS ARE SHOT.  MY MECHANIC SAYS THIS IS LOW MILEAGE FOR THIS TO HAPPEN; HOWEVER HE HAS SEEN A TREND WITH THE FORD TAURUS HAVING THIS PROBLEM.  I CALLED SUPERIOR FORD AND SPOKE WITH A  [XXX] REGARDING THIS PROBLEM AND HE CONVENIENTLY GOT RID OF ME - AS LONG AS THERE ARE NO DEATHS RESULTING AS OF YET.....FORD WILL DENY ANY PROBLEMS.   *NLM      INFORMATION REDACTED PURSUANT TO THE FREEDOM OF INFORMATION ACT (FOIA), 5 U.S.C. 552(B)(6).  *TR
